sentence.Network_en: They have only a vague idea of the amount of water available.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们只是大概知道可用水的总量。

sentence.Network_en: Other amenities, less commonly available, include a library and exercise room.
sentence.Network_cn: 还有一些不太常有的设施，包括图书馆和健身房。

sentence.Network_en: Cheap goods are available, but not in sufficient quantities to satisfy demand.
sentence.Network_cn: 有一些廉价的商品，但是数量不足以满足需求。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English  (in the senses 'effectual, serviceable and legally valid'): from avail + -able. The sense 'at someone's disposal' dates from the early 19th cent

entry.def: If something you want or need is available, you can find it or obtain it.

example.ex: Since 1978, the amount of money available to buy books has fallen by 17%...
example.tran: 自1978年以来，可用于采购图书的经费已经减少了17％。

example.ex: There are three small boats available for hire...

entry.def: Someone who is available is not busy and is therefore free to talk to you or to do a particular task.

example.ex: Mr Leach is on holiday and was not available for comment.
example.tran: 利奇先生休假了，不方便作出评论。

means.word_mean: 1. obtainable or accessible and ready for use or service;

sentences.sentence: "the list of available candidates is unusually long"
"he was available and willing to accompany her"
"2000 square feet of usable office space"

auth_sentence.content: BBC World News will soon be available in Burma.
auth_sentence.res_content: BBC World News will soon be available in Burma.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: BBC World News will soon be available in Burma.

auth_sentence.content: The full Ofcom statement is available on their website.
auth_sentence.res_content: The full Ofcom statement is available on their website.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The full Ofcom statement is available on their website.

auth_sentence.content: The national service is available five days a week.
auth_sentence.res_content: The national service is available five days a week.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The national service is available five days a week.

stems_affixes.value_cn: [用于物]可利用的;可见到的,接受采访的
stems_affixes.word_buile: avail效用,利益+able能……的→adj.[用于物]可利用的;可见到的,接受采访的

stems_affixes.value_cn: [一般用于否定句或疑问句中]效用,利益
可用性, 有效性, 实用性
stems_affixes.word_buile: avail效用,利益+ability能……→n.可用性, 有效性, 实用性

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有益于, 有帮助, 有用, 有利

Sentence.sentence: Such books, which only rarely end up in permanent collections, either private or public, will probably only be available as e-books within a few years.

The ability to draw upon every available tool and insight—picked up from science, arts, and technology—to solve the problems of the future, and take advantage of the opportunities that present themselves, will be helpful to them and the United States

Here's where things get interesting, though: If a particularly important passage is highlighted by multiple Inkling users, that information is stored on the cloud and is available for anyone reading the same textbook to come across.
Generous parental leave policies and readily available part-time options have unintended consequences:instead of strengthening women's attachment to the workplace,they appear to weaken it.
Do you by any chance have a car available?
A lot of cool stuff will be available online tomorrow.

means.word_mean: 可用的，现成可使用的，合用的，便于利用的，在手边的；适用于…的；可得到的，可获得的；可达到的；近便的；便利的，便于使用的

sentences.en: I'll send you all the periodicals available.
sentences.cn: 我将把我能得到的期刊给你寄去。

sentences.en: My bicycle is not available, and it is being repaired.
sentences.cn: 我的自行车现在不能用, 因为正在修理。

sentences.en: The season ticket is available for three months.
When would the search function become available.
sentences.cn: 何时搜索功能才能实现。

means.word_mean: 可会见的, 可与之交谈的；可接见的；可取得联系的；有暇的，空闲的，有时间的；暂时无工作的

sentences.en: The doctor is not available now.
He was not always available to everyone.
sentences.cn: 并不是人人总能找到他。

jushi.english: This was the only available room.
jushi.chinese: 只剩下那个房间可用了。

jushi.english: We took the earliest available train to Boston.
jushi.chinese: 我们乘上了最早能乘上的开往波士顿的列车。
